structure.unit: SOVEREIGNTY AND JURISDICTION OF THE COMMONWEALTH
GRANTS TO UNITED STATES OF LANDS AND RIGHTS TO ACQUIRE

law.catch_line: Jurisdiction over federal correctional institution at Manchester ceded.
law.text: Kentucky cedes to the United States concurrent civil and criminal jurisdiction over all of the land and premises acquired by the United States in Clay County constituting the federal correctional institution at Manchester.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 1, effective April 29, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/94). By a letter dated April 29, 1994, the Attorney General of the United States advised the Governor of Kentucky that the United States accepted jurisdiction over the correctional facility as provided by 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 2, thereby making effective this statute.
